title: Handkerchief, ca. 1938
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: blocked printed on chiffon
description: Handkerchief of white chiffon printed in red with gold in a design showing a human figure under an arbor along with a vine and sprays filling the field. Printed in Paris from a Pillement woodblock.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, ca. 1938.Medium: silk
Technique: blocked printed on chiffon. 1940-16-1.
